alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:54PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warden, or 16 miles northeast of Rayville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Darnell around 410 PM CDT. Monticello around 415 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pioneer and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
